Parameters

float __trainable__::train_dataset ( )
inline

Train the mlp with the parameters indicated in the table, and returns the MSE of the dataset.

Parameters
params.input_datasetA dataset object with each input pattern of the training.
params.output_datasetA dataset object with the corresponding output pattern for each input in input_dataset param.

References dataset::numPatterns().

float __trainable__::train_pattern ( input_table  ,
target_output_table   
)
inline

This functions train the mlp object one time with one pattern. The sizes of the input_table and output_table must be corrects for the corresponding mlp object.

Parameters
input_tableThe input pattern. Is a lua table.
target_output_tableThe desired output pattern. Is a lua table.
float __trainable__::use_dataset ( )
inline

Use a dataset with the mlp and puts outputs on other dataset

Parameters
params.input_datasetA dataset object with each input pattern of the training.
params.output_datasetA dataset object with the corresponding output pattern for each input in input_dataset param.
float __trainable__::validate_dataset ( )
inline

Validate a dataset with the mlp and the parameters indicated in the table, and returns the MSE of the dataset.

Parameters
params.input_datasetA dataset object with each input pattern of the training.
params.output_datasetA dataset object with the corresponding output pattern for each input in input_dataset param.

References dataset::numPatterns().
